title: Add HTTP/3 QUIC support
description: Latest HTTP protocol version using QUIC transport. Requires integration with quiche, ngtcp2, or similar QUIC library.

title: Implement Kubernetes Ingress Controller
description: Native Kubernetes ingress support with annotation-based configuration, TLS termination, and service discovery.

title: Reduce information disclosure
description: Location: src/http.cc:127. Server version exposed in headers (Server: SHELOB/0.5 (Unix)). Fix: Make server header configurable, default to generic value or omit entirely, remove stack traces from error messages, sanitize error responses to avoid path disclosure.

title: Support custom error pages
description: Configurable error pages per status code (404, 500, etc.) with template support and per-virtual-host customization.

title: Add metrics and monitoring
description: Prometheus metrics endpoint, OpenTelemetry tracing support, and structured logging for observability.

title: Add gRPC support
description: HTTP/2 based gRPC proxying for microservices communication.

title: Create performance benchmarking suite
description: Automated performance testing suite to measure throughput, latency, and resource usage under various load conditions.

title: Add security monitoring and alerting
description: Implement anomaly detection: detect_port_scanning, detect_brute_force, detect_sql_injection, detect_xss_attempt, detect_directory_traversal. Add alert_suspicious_activity and auto_block_attacker functionality.

title: Improve connection pooling
description: Better connection reuse strategies, connection pool tuning, and keep-alive optimization.

title: Resource exhaustion - file descriptors
description: No limits on concurrent connections, open files, or sockets per IP. Attack: Exhaust file descriptors causing denial of service. Fix: Implement MAX_CONNECTIONS, MAX_CONN_PER_IP, MAX_OPEN_FILES limits using rlimit. Track connections per IP address.

title: Add WebSocket proxying
description: Full duplex WebSocket connection proxying with proper upgrade handling and connection management.

title: Add configuration file system
description: YAML/TOML configuration file support for server settings, virtual hosts, security policies, and other runtime options.

title: Add comprehensive security headers
description: Location: src/security_middleware.cc:24-29. Missing critical headers: CSP, HSTS, Permissions-Policy. Add: Content-Security-Policy, Strict-Transport-Security, Permissions-Policy, X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies, Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy, Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy, Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy.

title: Implement CSRF protection
description: POST/PUT/DELETE can be triggered cross-origin. Fix: Implement CSRF token generation and validation, add SameSite cookie attribute, validate Origin/Referer headers for state-changing operations.

title: Write deployment guide
description: Production deployment best practices including systemd service files, reverse proxy setup, and containerization.

title: Implement virtual hosts
description: Multi-domain hosting support with per-host configuration for document root, SSL certificates, access control, and other settings.

title: Fix logging security issues
description: Issues: Logs may contain sensitive data, no rotation, log injection possible. Fix: Sanitize log entries (remove passwords, tokens, PII), implement log rotation with size/time limits, escape newlines to prevent log injection, secure log file permissions (0600).

title: Implement defense in depth architecture
description: Implement multi-layer security: IPFirewall (Layer 1), RateLimiter (Layer 2), InputValidator (Layer 3), AuthenticationMgr (Layer 4), AuthorizationMgr (Layer 5), AuditLogger (Layer 6), IntrusionDetection (Layer 7).

title: Add Docker integration
description: Watch Docker API for container changes, automatic upstream discovery, and container label-based routing configuration.

title: Add server status page
description: Real-time server statistics endpoint showing connections, requests/sec, memory usage, uptime, and per-worker stats.

title: Add FastCGI support
description: FastCGI protocol implementation for PHP and other FastCGI-compatible language runtimes.

title: Add load balancing algorithms
description: Load balancing strategies: round-robin, least connections, weighted, IP hash, and consistent hashing.

title: Enable memory safety sanitizers in debug builds
description: Enable sanitizers in debug builds via meson.build: -fsanitize=address, -fsanitize=undefined, -fsanitize=leak, -fno-omit-frame-pointer.

title: Integrate fuzzing infrastructure
description: Integrate AFL++ or libFuzzer. Fuzz critical parsers: HTTP header parser, chunked encoding parser, range header parser, multipart form parser, URL decoder, cookie parser.

title: Implement health checks
description: Active and passive backend health monitoring with configurable check intervals, thresholds, and recovery behavior.

title: Implement memory pool allocator
description: Reduce allocation overhead with custom memory pool allocator for frequently allocated objects.

title: Write API documentation
description: Complete API reference documentation covering all HTTP endpoints, configuration options, and programmatic interfaces.

title: Improve session management
description: Issues: No session timeout, weak nonce generation, no session invalidation. Fix: Implement SessionManager class with SESSION_TIMEOUT (30min), ABSOLUTE_TIMEOUT (12hr), session rotation, cryptographically secure random nonces, cookie security flags (Secure, HttpOnly, SameSite).

title: Add service discovery integration
description: Integration with Consul, etcd, or similar service discovery systems for dynamic upstream configuration.

title: Validate redirect targets
description: Open redirect enables phishing attacks. Fix: Validate redirect targets are relative or whitelisted, reject absolute URLs to external domains.

title: Add automatic HTTPS with Let's Encrypt
description: Automatic certificate provisioning and renewal via ACME protocol (Let's Encrypt) integration.

title: Implement basic reverse proxy
description: Proxy requests to backend servers with configurable upstream definitions, path rewriting, and header manipulation.

title: Add dashboard UI
description: Web interface for real-time monitoring, configuration management, and server administration.

title: Create security testing suite
description: OWASP ZAP automated scanning, Burp Suite professional testing, custom exploit scripts for each CVE, CI/CD pipeline integration. Create attack simulations, automated vulnerability scanning, regular penetration testing schedule.

title: Integer overflow in file size handling
description: Location: src/http.cc:204-206, src/http.cc:255-257. tellg() returns streampos which could overflow. Symlink to /dev/zero or massive file could cause overflow and heap corruption. Fix: Add size validation before allocation.

title: Protect against decompression bombs
description: Location: Compression middleware. Attack: Upload 42KB file that decompresses to 4.5PB. Fix: Limit decompression ratio, limit decompressed size, stream decompression with monitoring.

title: Complete clang-tidy compliance
description: Fix remaining clang-tidy linting issues across the codebase.

title: Add Python WSGI support
description: Integration with Python web applications via WSGI protocol (PEP 3333).

title: Write security hardening guide
description: Security configuration documentation covering TLS setup, authentication, rate limiting, and attack mitigation.

title: Add zero-copy optimizations
description: Reduce memory copies in hot paths using sendfile(), splice(), or similar zero-copy techniques for static file serving.

title: Write performance tuning guide
description: Optimization documentation covering connection limits, buffer sizes, keep-alive tuning, and system configuration.

title: Add hot configuration reload
description: Zero-downtime configuration changes via SIGHUP or admin endpoint. Reload mime types, virtual hosts, and security settings without restart.

title: Add GitOps integration
description: Configuration from Git repositories with webhook-triggered updates and automatic rollback on errors.

title: HPACK Bomb Attack protection
description: No limits on HPACK table size. Maliciously compressed headers can expand to gigabytes (100KB compressed -> 10GB decompressed). Fix: Configure nghttp2 limits with nghttp2_option_set_max_deflate_dynamic_table_size and nghttp2_option_set_max_header_list_size.

title: Add circuit breaker
description: Automatic failover for unhealthy backends with configurable failure thresholds and half-open state recovery.
